<title level="1" right="Rules">[Snares](/Rules.aspx?ID=3315)</title>

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 297 <sup>1.1</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Snares are simple traps that can be created quickly with the [Snare Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=6506) feat to injure or bedevil intruders. Unlike other items, found snares can't be collected or sold in
their complete form. Snares have the [snare](/Traits.aspx?ID=809) trait.

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
